testsuite.name: uk.brent.slater.lendinglibrary.repository.BookRepositoryTest

testcase.name: Fail to find book by title
Fail to find book by author
Fail to find book by isbn
With one borrowed book and one not borrowed count returns 2 but countByIsBorrowed returns 1
